data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Thakurgaon, Rangpur, Bangladesh, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Thakurgaon, Rangpur, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Thakurgaon, Rangpur, Bangladesh.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,741 believers in Thakurgaon to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Thakurgaon hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Thakurgaon unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Thakurgaon, Rangpur, Bangladesh that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Thakurgaon.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Thakurgaon
location.people_groups_list: Ho, Mallah (Muslim traditions), Rajbansi Pali (Hindu traditions), Kotal, Dai (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Ho (67,000), Mallah (Muslim traditions) (17,000), Rajbansi Pali (Hindu traditions) (305,000), Kotal (200), Dai (Muslim traditions) (13,000)
